answers.answer: Its called preclampsia they want to see if you're at risk for it which is why you have to collect urine to see if it has protein in it
Am I gonna.be ok? Im worried...
Yeah youre okay they'll just put you on medicine and keep it monitored.
I Js dont understand everytime I see my,doctor I get nervous lol maybe that's why my heartbeats really fast.. Today was the 3rd consecutive check up that I have high blood pressure..
That's probably why they suggested the time high blood pressure is one sign and protein in your urine but don't worry just stay calm untily find out for side

I had to collect my urine for 24 hrs as well .. But I never found out the results ..  the day I had my app. My bp was very high (at 35 weeks) and my doc was very concerned because it was not just my high bp but I was also very swollen ... So she sent me to L&D that was a monday and I was induced to have my baby on tuesday she was born wed morning ... They said I had severe preeclampsia and I had to deliver my baby because we were both at risk ... Thank God everything went well ..

Oh wow thats pretty scary but glad everything went well. Yea he.said he might deliver my,baby early if theres something wrong... Nway for the urine thing u think its ok to miss one I.mean miss putting it to the.jug?

I had to do the urine collection Friday, still waiting on the results. They specifically told me to not miss even 1 because it could mess up the results and if you do have preeclampsia, it can be a serious issue.

question: Saw his little penis lol. Nway so today my doc was concerned about my high blood pressure.. So he wants me.to gather up all my urine and.put it on this jug for 24 hrs and run a test for.some protein test idk...Have u ladies had this problem before???
title: its a boy!!!!!
